text:
Power supply in the following areas will get affected in view of the maintenance work to be carried out in the Old Pettai sub-station on Monday between 9 a.m. and 2 p.m.

Tirunelveli Town, West Car Street, North Car Street, South Car Street, Old Pettai, Gandhi Nagar, Thiruppanikarisalkulam, Vaagaikulam, Kunnaththur, Pettai, Industrial Estate, Paattapaththu and Abhishekapatti.
title: Power shutdown
